== Shirali (603822) ==
      
Shirali is a village in the [[Bhatkal ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 1315.55 hectares and harbouring 2966 households with total population of 13899 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[BHATKAL]] is at a distance of 6 km. Male population is 6930 and female population is 6969. Scheduled Caste Population is 2249 and Scheduled Tribes population is 367. Census Location Code of the village is 603822<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
